K08bsu040_u:2: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmānupaliḥ pratisaṃlayanāta vyutthāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmat /
K08bsu040_u:3: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikāntaṃ nyasīdat /
K08bsu040_u:5: iha bhagavanmamaikākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīna cittasyāyamevaṃrupaścetasi cetaḥparivitarka udapādi /
K08bsu040_u:6: prātimokṣasaṃvaro bhagavatā prajñaptaścādhiśīlaśikṣā pariśuddhiḥ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānām ca /
K08bsu040_u:7: bodhisatvāyānikānāṃ tu bhagavatā jīvitaparityāge 'pi śikṣāpyatra parideśitā nirdiṣṭā /
K08bsu040_u:8: tat kathaṃ bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasya tiṣṭhato vā śrāvakayānikānāṃ prātimokṣasaṃvaro vaktavyaḥ /
K08bsu040_u:12: tasya me bhagavan vijñāpayatūpāyakauśalyaṃ samprakāśayatu bhagavan yathā bhagavataḥ
K08bsu040_u:13: sakāśāt sammukhaṃ śrutvā sammukhaṃ pratigṛhya vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ parṣatsu vistareṇa saṃprakāśayeyam /
K08bsu040_u:14: ayaṃ me bhagavannekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasyaivaṃrupaścetasi cetaḥ parivitarka udapādi yattvahaṃ bhagavantamusaṃkramya vinayaviniścayaṃ paripṛccheyamiti /
K08bsu040_u:15: tat sādhu bhagavan vyākarotu tathāgato vinayaviniścayaṃ vistareṇa mahatī bhikṣuparṣata sannipatitā bodhisattvaparṣacca /
K08bsu040_u:17: tasmāttarhitvamupāle anyena prayogeṇānyenādhyāśayena śrāvakayānikānāṃ śikṣāpariśuddhiṃ vada /
K08bsu040_u:22: tatropāleyā śrāvakayānikasya pariśuddhaśīlatā sā mahāyānikasya bodhisattvasyāpariśuddhaśīlatā paramadauḥśīlyañca /
K08bsu040_u:23: yā mahāyānasamprasthitasya bodhisattvasya pariśuddhaśīlatā sā śrāvakayānikasyāpariśuddhaśīlatā paramadauḥśīlyañca /
K08bsu040_u:26: iyaṃ śrāvakayānikasya pariśuddhaśīlatā sā mahāyānikasya bodhisatvasyā pariśuddhaśīlata paramadauḥ śīlyañca /
K08bsu040_u:27: katamopāle mahāyānasamprasthitasya bodhisattvasya pariśuddhaśīlatā yā śrāvakayānikasyāpariśuddhaśīlatā paramadauḥśilyañca /
K08bsu040_u:28: ihopāle mahāyāne samprasthito bodhisattvo 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyān kalpān bhavopapattiṃ parigṛṇhāti aparikhinnacitto 'parikhinnamānasaḥ /
K08bsu040_u:29: iyaṃ mahāyānasamprasthitasya bodhisattvasya pariśuddhaśīlatā sā śrāvakayānikasyāpariśuddhaśīlatā paramadauḥśīlyañca /
K08bsu040_u:30: tasmāttarhi tvamupāle sānurakṣāṃ śikṣāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vada /
K08bsu040_u:36: kathaṃ copāle sānurakṣā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ niranurakṣā śikṣā śrāvaka yānikānām /
K08bsu040_u:37: ihopāle mahāyāna saṃprasthitena bodhisattvena parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ hitamanuvartitavyaṃ na punaḥ śrāvakayānikena /
K08bsu040_u:38: anenopāle paryyāyeṇa sānurakṣā śikṣā mahāyānikānām bodhisattvānāṃ niranurakṣā śikṣā śrāvakayānikānām /
K08bsu040_u:39: kathaṃ copāle saparihārā śikṣā mahāyānasamprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ niḥ parihārāśikṣā śrāvakayānikānām /
K08bsu040_u:40: ihopāle mahānasaṃprasthitobodhisattvo 'pi saceta pūrvvāṇhasamaye āpattimāpadyeta madhyānhakāle sarvvajñatācittenāvirahito viharedaparyyantaḥ
K08bsu040_u:44: sacet sāyānhasamaey āpattimāpadyeta rātryāḥ purimayāme sarvvajñatācittenāvirahito viharedaparyyantaḥ /
K08bsu040_u:46: sacet rātryāḥ purimayāme āpattimāpadyeta rātryāśca madhyamayāme sarvvajñatācittenāvirahito viharedaparyyantaḥ /
K08bsu040_u:48: sacet rātryā madhyamayāme āpattimāpadyeta rātryāśca paścimayāme sarvvajñatācittenāvirahito viharedaparyyantaḥ /
K08bsu040_u:50: evaṃ hyupāle saparihārā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ /
K08bsu040_u:51: tatra bodhisattvena nātra kaukṛtyaparyyutthānamutpādyaṃ nātivipratisāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ /
K08bsu040_u:52: tatropāle sacecchrāvakayānikaḥ punaḥ punarāpattimāpadyeta naṣṭaḥ śrāvakayānikasya śīlaskandho veditavyaḥ /
K08bsu040_u:54: ādīpta śiraścailopamena hi śrāvakayānikena bhavitavyaṃ sarvakleśaprahāṇāya /
K08bsu040_u:55: evaṃ niḥparihārā śikṣā śrāvakayānikasya hyupāle parinirvvāṇakāmasya /
K08bsu040_u:56: katham copāle dūrānupraviṣṭā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvnāṃ sāvadānā śikṣā śrāvakayānikānāṃ /
K08bsu040_u:57: ihopāle mahāyānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍitvā ramitvā paricārayitvā bodhicittaṃ notsṛjati
K08bsu040_u:60: bhaviṣyatyupāle sa kālaḥ sa samayo yanmahāyānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvastenaiva bodhicittena suparigṛhītena svapnāntaragato 'pi sarvvakleśairnna saṃhariṣyate /
K08bsu040_u:61: api ca mahāyānasaṃprasthitena bodhisattvena naikasminneva bhave sarvvakleśāḥ kṣapayitavyāḥ /
K08bsu040_u:63: paripakvakuśalamūlena ca śrāvakayānikenādīptaśi śacailopamena hi tatkṣaṇikokapi bhavopapattirnnotpāditavyā /
K08bsu040_u:64: evamupāle dūrānupraviṣṭā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sāvadānāṃ śikṣā śrāvakayānikānām //
K08bsu040_u:65: tasmāttarhi tvamupāle sānurakṣāṃ saparihārāṃ dūrānupraviṣṭāṃ śikṣāṃ mahāyānasamprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vada /
K08bsu040_u:66: niranurakṣāṃ niḥparihārām sāvadānāṃ śikṣāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ vada /
K08bsu040_u:68: mahāsaṃbhārā hyupāle 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirna sukarā ekāntaniviṣṭena mahāyānasaṃprasthitena bodhisattvenā prameyāsaṃkhyeyān kalpān saṃdhārayituṃ saṃsarituma /
K08bsu040_u:69: idaṃ copāle 'rthavaśaṃ sampaśyan tathāgataḥ samyaksambuddho mahāyānāsaṃprasthitānāṃ
K08bsu040_u:70: bodhisattvnāṃ naikāntanirvvedakathāṃ kathayati naikāntavirāgakathāṃ kathayati naikāntavirāgakathāṃ
K08bsu040_u:72: api tu khalu punaḥ prītikathāṃ prāmodyakathām pratityasamutpādasamprayuktakathāṃ kathayati /
K08bsu040_u:76: ta imāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā 'bhiratāḥ saṃprāptā na parikhidyante bodhisambhārañca paripūrayanti /
K08bsu040_u:78: yā imā bhagavannāpattayaḥ kāścidrāgasaṃyuktāḥ kāścit dveṣāsaṃyuktāḥ kāścinmohasaṃyuktāḥ /
K08bsu040_u:79: tatra katamā bhagavan mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya gurutarā āpattayaḥ /
K08bsu040_u:80: kiṃ rāgasaṃprayuktā utāho dveṣasaṃprayuktāḥ utāho mohasaṃprayuktāḥ /
K08bsu040_u:82: sacedupāle mahāyānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā rāgasaṃprayuktā āpattīrāpadyeta
K08bsu040_u:85: tat kasmāddhetordveṣa upāle sattvaparityāgāya saṃvarttate rāgaḥ sattvasaṃgrahāya saṃvarttate iti /
K08bsu040_u:86: tatropāle yaḥ kleśaḥ sattvasaṃgrahāya saṃvarttate tatra bodhisattvasya na chalaṃ na bhayam /
K08bsu040_u:87: yaḥ kleśaḥ sattvaparityāgāya saṃvarttate tatra bodhisattvasya chalañca bhayañca /
K08bsu040_u:88: api tūpāle uktam pūrvvameva rāgo bandhavirāgo 'lpasāvadyo dveṣah kṣipravirāgo mahāsāvadyaḥ /
K08bsu040_u:90: yaḥ kṣipravirāgo mahāsāvadyaḥ kleśaḥ sa bodhisattvasya svapnāntaragatasyāpi naiva yuktaḥ /
K08bsu040_u:91: tasmāttarhi tvamupāle bodhisattvānaṃ yāḥ kāścid rāgasaṃprayuktā āpattayaḥ sarvvāstā anāpattaya iti dhāraya /
K08bsu040_u:92: tatropāle ye 'nupāyakuśalā bodhisattvāste rāgasaṃprayuktābhya āpatibhyo vibhyati na dveṣasamprayuktābhyaḥ /
K08bsu040_u:93: ye punarupāyakuśalā bodhisattvāste dveṣasaṃprayuktābhya āpattibhyo vibhyati na rāgasamprayuktābhyaḥ /
K08bsu040_u:94: atha khalu te tasyāmeva parṣadi mañjuśrīkumarabhūtaḥ sannipatito 'bhūt /
K08bsu040_u:99: ātyantavinītān sarvvadharmān jānīyustadapi na bhūyastathāgato vinayaḥ prajñāpyeta /
K08bsu040_u:100: sattvā na prīṇanti tasmāt tathāgato 'tyantavinītānāṃ sarvvadharmmānāṃ bodhāya vinayaṃ prajñāpayatyanupūrveṇeti yoniśamupādāya // 0 //
